about_the_game:
Digital Meow is an engaging platformer, inspired by the atmosphere of old operating systems and digital art. Immerse yourself in the story of a little cat journeying through a digital world in search of a new home. Encounter dangerous traps like lasers, spikes, cannons, and more. But the kitten's will is unshakeable—overcome these challenging obstacles together in Digital Meow!



Key Features:

  • Vaporwave Aesthetic:

    Enjoy a unique visual style that combines the nostalgic feel of old operating systems with modern digital art, creating a captivating and immersive environment.

  • Challenging Gameplay:

    Navigate through a variety of perilous traps, including lasers, spikes, and cannons, requiring precise timing and quick reflexes to overcome.

  • Engaging Story:

    Follow the heartwarming tale of a little cat on a quest to find a new home, adding emotional depth and motivation to the gameplay experience.

  • Innovative Level Design:

    Explore creatively designed levels that challenge your platforming skills and keep you engaged with new and exciting obstacles at every turn.

name: Digital Meow

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 3.0GHz i5 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD 3600 (1GB)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.

short_description: Digital Meow is a vaporwave platformer where a little cat journeys through a digital world to find a new home. Overcome lasers, spikes, and cannons in this nostalgic and challenging adventure!
